title: A Similar Font?
content:
I need a similar font (or the same) for a design

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712125751im_/http:/typophile.com/files/500px-Magicka_Wordmark_6326.svg.png)
author: The-Marker

comments.content:
Exact match of base font -- the red part -- with [Stonecross](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712125751/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/stonecross/) from Scriptorium.  
The gold trim is an addition.  
Don
